A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ambitious and entertaining. It wasn't everything I wanted\, and at first because it was structured so differently than past films\, I didn't connect with the film. The second half grabbed my attention however and the changes grew on me. In a world where lasers never hit their mark and plot holes abound in exchange for theatrical impact\, I found the film's themes hit me hard and stuck with me long after the screening ended. Is there controversy? Yes - this is a new Star Wars\, and even with its faults\, it's worth seeing for its strengths and fresh perspective\, maybe even worth seeing twice.
